comment.author: 55384141@N00
comment._content: I believe this is actually not near Creede, CO at all. A horizon this flat can only be seen near the front range in Colorado. I would guess that this is taken on US-40 climbing Mount Vernon Canyon west of Golden, CO, facing west. The hill in the center just below the horizon would then be Green Mountain south of Golden. These days, I-70 takes up most of this valley, as you can see in this shot facing uphill: www.dot.state.co.us/50anniversary/images/I70Photos/I70Mou...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Custos2001, thanks for the information!  For now, we're gathering the suggestions and corrections, but will hold off on making changes until more comments come in.

comment.realname: If you need to know, then you know
comment.author: 55671979@N00
comment._content: Looks like I-70 to me too.  Before I-70 was there though.  :)

comment.author: 32216209@N08
comment._content: I agree with custos2001's comment, except that the view is to the east (not west).  At the time of that photo, the highway was designated as both US 6 and US 40.

comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called White Wall Tires, and we'd love to have this added to the group! My guess is that the car is a Packard, but evidence is minimal at best. I notice that it has white wall tires.

comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: Yep, you're right.  A Buick.  I had to look at the large size.

comment.author: 16333811@N00
comment._content:
I think I pretty much confirmed as best I could that this photo was taken on US 40 west of Denver, CO, and not near Creede (which is a few hundred miles southwest).

comment.author: 56779153@N02
comment._content: This picture is the perfect way to describe Colorado. I love the vintage car in the picture and the way it shows the hillside with a hint of snow.

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Nice sample of early Feininger work. Would be nice to see the colors restored... Added to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andreas_Feininger and en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._Route_40_in_Colorado Thanks for posting it!

definitely not near Creede, Co. This is a few miles west of golden, in what is now known as Genessee/Lookout Mountain, in golden, Co. I live somewhere off to the left.
